attributes.action: Ban all products or services arising from deforestation
attributes.additional_details: The UK should no longer play any part in the intentional or unintentional destruction of ancient forests around the world, whether directly or indirectly, in the pursuit of economic or private business interests.
attributes.background: Deforestation is causing direct harm to the natural habitat of thousands of indigenous species of animals.  Deforestation is also cutting off the oxygen supply to the world and adding huge volume of carbon dioxide into the atmosphere.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure what you'd like to be covered by "products or services arising from deforestation"

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
